section.title: Enable Image service meters for Ubuntu
section.para: Telemetry uses notifications to collect Image service meters. Perform these steps on the controller node.

section.title: Configure the Image service to use Telemetry

listitem.para: Edit the /etc/glance/glance-api.conf and /etc/glance/glance-registry.conf files and complete the following actions:
In the [DEFAULT], [oslo_messaging_notifications] sections, configure notifications and RabbitMQ message broker access:
Replace RABBIT_PASS with the password you chose for the openstack account in RabbitMQ.

listitem.screen: # service glance-registry restart # service glance-api restart
